name: unmemorable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not likely to be remembered, or not worth remembering: It was a very unmemorable dinner party - awful food and boring conversation. She was a phenomenally successful singer and songwriter but I'm afraid I find her songs totally unmemorable. Opposite
memorable
More examplesFewer examplesHe was a very ordinary-looking man with one of those unmemorable faces.After a largely unmemorable series of games, the basketball season really kicked into gear with some thrilling encounters.He had to change the password for his account as it was just too unmemorable.
